            # Laraset

            # Overview

            Laraset is a module manager using Laravel artisan CLI.

            It's targets all preset Laravel uses. it has the ability to Create Delete Units that wrap all laravel features & preset used in one folder that can exported or event imported from project to another.

            PS :

            Laraset still in development phase, there is a possiblity that some of those feature is not available yet.

            # Change Log

            # v0.4.0

            • fix bugs
            • well documented functions
            • update documentation
